category.name: Family Prayers
category.description: Prayers for family devotion and spiritual growth

content.text:
God, My Ultimate Goal,

It's my greatest joy, the absolute best thing,
to get to know You
and to understand my own soul, which is real and eternal.
It's so cool and interesting
to look deep inside myself
when all my energy and desires are focused on chasing after You,
when my soul is desperately reaching
to be more like You
and to be completely with You.
No hours go by with as much happiness
as the ones I spend connecting with You
and with my own heart.

Oh, how good and valuable it is for my walk with God
to have a spirit of being aware
and protective over my own heart,
when my soul isn't afraid of anything
except for letting You down or hurting You, the amazing God,
my Father and my friend.
In those moments, I want to love You and make You proud,
way more than I want to just be happy myself.

Knowing that this is the right mindset,
the one worth aiming for and chasing after
as a thinking person and a follower of Jesus,
let my joy come from bringing You glory and making You happy.

I want to fill all my time with You,
whether I'm at home or on the go;
to put all my worries and plans in Your hands;
to be completely available for Your plan,
without any agenda or interests of my own.
Help me to live for You forever,
to make You my final and only purpose,
so that I never again choose to love my own selfish ways.
